Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a game-ending infield single with one out in the 11th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Yankees outlasted the Kansas City Royals for a 4-3 victory
The Yankees increased their AL East lead to 1 1/2 games over Baltimore
Others: Tyler O'Neill hit a three-run walk-off homer to give the Boston Red Sox a 5-3 victory over the Baltimore Orioles
